docs.snippet: The Chicago Bears and the Pro Bowl receiver Brandon Marshall agreed to a three-year contract extension through the 2017 season....

docs.snippet: A group of retired pro football players sued the National Football League on Tuesday, saying they were illegally fed painkillers and told to play while injured to keep massive profits flowing to the league for three decades....
docs.lead_paragraph: A group of retired pro football players sued the National Football League on Tuesday, saying they were illegally fed painkillers and told to play while injured to keep massive profits flowing to the league for three decades.

headline.main: Ex-Football Players Sue NFL, Claiming 'Culture of Drug Misuse'
headline.print_headline: Ex-Football Players Sue NFL, Claiming 'Culture of Drug Misuse'

docs.snippet: Engineers were working Tuesday to close a yawning sinkhole that gobbled up a part of the end zone of a Tennessee university's football stadium....

docs.snippet: One of the most expensive high school football stadiums in the United States will remain closed through the 2014 football season after an engineering firm declared it unsafe, school officials said on Tuesday....

docs.snippet: AT&T Inc can pull out of its agreement to buy DirecTV if the satellite TV operator is unable to renew a deal with the National Football League to offer the popular NFL Sunday Ticket football package, according to a regulatory filing on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: AT&T Inc can pull out of its agreement to buy DirecTV if the satellite TV operator is unable to renew a deal with the National Football League to offer the popular NFL Sunday Ticket football package, according to a regulatory filing on Monday.

headline.main: AT&T-DirecTV Merger May Hinge on NFL Agreement
headline.print_headline: AT&T-DirecTV Merger May Hinge on NFL Agreement

docs.snippet: Arjen Robben has been given a few days rest by coach Louis van Gaal after winning the German Cup with Bayern Munich and did not travel on Tuesday with the Netherlands squad to their World Cup training camp in Portugal....
docs.lead_paragraph: Arjen Robben has been given a few days rest by coach Louis van Gaal after winning the German Cup with Bayern Munich and did not travel on Tuesday with the Netherlands squad to their World Cup training camp in Portugal.
